mapper.select: select p.*,m.merchantname from T_SE_PAYMENTS_HF p left join t_se_merchant_hf m on m.merchantno=p.SRCOUTSYSTEMID where p.URID = #{urid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select u.* from (select * from T_SE_PAYMENTS_HF) u
